word_mean: 叶绿素：所有进行光合作用的细胞中都有的一组绿色色素，其与血红素的差异在于：螯合物的中心金属原子为锰(而不是铁)，除四个吡咯环外，还有一个并合的环戊酮环和一条植醇长侧链。叶绿素通过吸收光产生一个激发电子而起作用，后者沿色素分子的链转移，最后产生ATP或NADH。叶绿素a见于一切需氧光合作用的生物体如绿色植物、藻类及蓝藻细菌(cyanobacteria)
叶绿素b见于高等植物，叶绿素c1及c2见于硅藻及褐藻，叶绿素d见于红藻
菌叶绿素则见于具厌氧光合作用的细菌。水溶性叶绿素盐制剂主要由叶绿素钠及／或钾盐的铜络合物组成，外用于皮肤病损以除其臭味，口服可为溃疡性病损以及结肠造口术、回肠造口术或大小便失禁时的尿、粪除臭

sentence.Network_en: Chlorophyll is produced by the action of light on the plants'leaves.
sentence.Network_cn: 光对植物的叶子发生作用从而产生叶绿素.

sentence.Network_en: The disease causes varying degrees of destruction of the chlorophyll.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一病害使叶绿素遭到不同程度的破坏.

sentence.Network_en: The structure of the chlorophyll molecule is known . It consists ofporphyrin.
sentence.Network_cn: 叶绿素的分子结构已经搞清, 它是由卟啉组成的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 叶绿素(chloroPhyll)是植物进行光合作用的重要物质。叶绿素含量是研究植物生长特性、生理变化和氮素营养状况的重要指标「上」， …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: coined in French from Greek khlōros 'green' + phullon 'leaf'

entry.def: Chlorophyll is a green substance in plants which enables them to use the energy from sunlight in order to grow.

means.word_mean: 1. any of a group of green pigments found in photosynthetic organisms

auth_sentence.content: The pigments are the chlorophyll which carry out photosynthesis.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pigments are the chlorophyll which carry out photosynthesis.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pigments are the chlorophyll which carry out photosynthesis.

auth_sentence.content: The green colouring in plant leaves is called chlorophyll.
auth_sentence.res_content: The green colouring in plant leaves is called chlorophyll.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The green colouring in plant leaves is called chlorophyll.

auth_sentence.content: Plants need light to be able to make chlorophyll.
